_BEGIN_ UNK 19 UNK study _END_
_BEGIN_ noise pollution threatens protected wildlife areas UNK study _END_
_BEGIN_ washington UNK may 7 UNK pti UNK noise pollution caused by humans is pervasive in the us protected areas UNK posing a threat to land masses that harbour wildlife and provide places for respite UNK recreation UNK and natural resource conservation UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ protected areas in the us represent about 14 per cent of the land mass UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ researchers UNK including those from colorado state university in the us UNK analysed millions of hours of sound measurements from UNK sites around continental us UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the results summarised predictions of existing sound levels UNK estimates of natural sound levels UNK and the amount that human UNK made noise raises levels above natural levels UNK which is considered noise pollution UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ researchers found that human UNK made noise doubled background sound levels in 63 per cent of us protected areas UNK and caused a ten UNK fold or greater increase in background levels in 21 per cent of protected areas UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in other words UNK noise reduced the area that natural sounds can be heard by 50 to 90 per cent UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this also means that what could be heard at 100 feet away could only be heard from 10 to 50 feet UNK researchers said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this reduced capacity to hear natural sound reduces the UNK properties of spending time in nature UNK such as mood enhancement and stress reduction UNK interfering with the enjoyment typically experienced by park visitors UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the noise levels we found can be harmful to visitor experiences in these areas UNK and can be harmful to human health UNK and to wildlife UNK said rachel UNK UNK from warner college of natural resources in the us UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK we were encouraged to see that many large wilderness areas have sound levels that are close to natural levels UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ protecting these important natural UNK resources as development and land conversion progresses is critical if we want to preserve the character of protected areas UNK she said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ high levels of noise pollution were also found in critical habitat for endangered species UNK namely in endangered plant and insect habitats UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK although plants can not hear UNK many animals that disperse seeds or UNK flowers can hear and are known to be affected by noise UNK resulting in indirect impacts on plants UNK said UNK UNK _END_

_BEGIN_ india changes its four UNK decade UNK old definition of blindness _END_
_BEGIN_ india has changed its over four UNK decade UNK old definition of blindness UNK bringing it in line with the who criteria UNK a step that would drastically bring down the number of people considered UNK blind UNK in the country UNK according to the new definition UNK a person who is unable to count fingers from a distance of three metres would be considered UNK blind UNK as against the earlier UNK of six metres UNK which was adopted in 1976 UNK the aim of revising the definition is also to be able to generate data which can be compared with global estimates and achieve the who goal of reducing the blindness prevalence of india to 0 UNK 3 per cent of the total population by 2020 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the notification in this regard has been issued by the union health ministry UNK going by the new definition UNK the population of blind people in india will reduce from 1 UNK 20 crore UNK as per national blindness survey 2007 data UNK to 80 lakh UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK because of the earlier definition UNK we were projecting a higher figure of blind people from india at any international forum UNK presenting ourselves in poor light UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK also UNK the data that we generated under the programme could not be compared with the global estimates as other countries were following the who definition UNK said dr UNK gupta UNK deputy director general of national programme for control of blindness UNK npcb UNK further UNK india has to achieve the goal set by the who which recommends reducing the prevalence of blindness to 0 UNK 3 per cent by 2020 to achieve the elimination of avoidable blindness UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK it would have been extremely difficult to achieve the who goal using the earlier npcb definition since we had been addressing an extra 4 million UNK 40 lakh UNK individuals blind due to UNK errors UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ whereas UNK by adopting the blindness criteria of who UNK india now can achieve the goal UNK said professor praveen UNK UNK in UNK charge community UNK at dr r p centre for UNK sciences UNK aiims UNK also UNK the name of the scheme UNK UNK national programme for control of blindness UNK has been changed to UNK the national programme for control of blindness and visual impairment UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the programme UNK henceforth UNK will not only focus on the blind persons but also those with some kind of visual impairment UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ with the change in UNK UNK the number of beneficiaries will now increase to 40 million UNK dr UNK added UNK the previous definition of blindness was adopted at the time of the inception of the npcb in 1976 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the probable reason for keeping 6 metres as the cut off distance for defining blindness in india was to include economic blindness cases which referred to a level of blindness which prevents an individual to earn his or her wages UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK in contrast UNK the who definition adopts a criteria for blindness that is which hampers the routine social interaction of a person UNK social blindness UNK gupta said UNK _END_

UNK parekh said the government has extended the 100 per cent tax deduction scheme for affordable housing projects approved between june 2016 and march 2019 UNK by two more years till 2021 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK what this effectively means is that any developer UNK for affordable housing project UNK has to pay zero tax UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ i do not know of any industry in india where you have to pay coming from a particular source UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK they might simply regard the shape as a characteristic of products of that kind or they might find it brings to mind the product and brand name with which they have become familiar UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK these kinds of recognition and association do not amount to distinctiveness for trademark purposes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the judges also _BEGIN_ art of living event destroyed yamuna floodplains UNK ngt panel _END_
_BEGIN_ the damage to the yamuna floodplains caused by the art of living UNK s three UNK day cultural festival last year will cost more than rs 42 crore and at least 10 years to fix UNK according to the expert panel appointed by the national green tribunal UNK the foundation has UNK however UNK called the committee biased and acting with vested interests UNK the expert panel UNK headed by shashi shekhar UNK secretary of ministry of water resources UNK submitted its report to the ngt on wednesday UNK on damage assessment following the art of living UNK s three UNK day world culture festival in march 2016 UNK the panel has suggested a time UNK bound action plan UNK which comprises two components UNK physical and biological rehabilitation UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the physical component is estimated to cost around rs 28 UNK 73 crore and the biological part would cost around rs 13 UNK 29 crore UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK in addition to this UNK there would be expenditure for the monitoring by a team of experts for 10 years and the cost of transportation of material outside the floodplain UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ said an expert UNK the 47 UNK page report estimates that approximately 120 hectares UNK about 300 acres UNK of floodplains of west UNK right bank UNK of the river yamuna and about 50 hectares UNK 120 acres UNK floodplains of the eastern side UNK left bank UNK of the river have been adversely supposed to be non UNK interested parties to the case and were to act as the eyes and ears of judges have given biased interviews in public while the case is sub UNK judice UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the closeness of the petitioner with the expert committee members was not disclosed to us when it was appointed by ngt and went into the preparation of the report UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ said kedar desai UNK the spokesperson UNK desai said the art of living foundation is a UNK responsible and environmentally sensitive ngo UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ and its legal team will be looking into the report to decide on the appropriate future action UNK the ngt had allowed the festival in march 2016 UNK saying that as the matter was UNK fait accompli UNK they could not ban it UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the three UNK day world cultural festival soon grabbed headlines for allegedly polluting and damaging the yamuna floodplain ecosystem UNK the ngt slapped an interim fine rs 5 crore on the foundation for environmental damage while efforts were made to ascertain the exact costs of the damage UNK an initial four UNK member committee had recommended that the foundation pay rs100 to rs 120 crores as compensation for the restoration work UNK the green court had later asked an expert panel of seven members to estimate the damage to the floodplains and how much it would cost to fix these damages UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this committee observed that the festival had UNK completely destroyed UNK not simply damaged UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the riverfront area between dnd flyover and the UNK drain UNK which had served as the main _BEGIN_ you UNK says UNK _END_
_BEGIN_ where would apple UNK ibm be without global talent UNK urjit patel _END_
_BEGIN_ as the us under donald trump moves to make it difficult for indians to get h UNK 1b visa UNK rbi governor urjit patel has warned against protectionism UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ speaking in new york patel said that big american tech companies are maintained and powered by talented indians and without access to such skilled workers these companies may suffer UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK where would apple be UNK where would cisco be UNK where would ibm be if they were not sourcing the best products and talent from across the world UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ and if policies come in the way of that UNK then the big wealth creators in a country that advocates protectionism are ultimately affected UNK he said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK i don UNK t think that we have heard the last word on us policy talk about this because there is a push back internationally that the world has benefited from an open trading system UNK the rbi governor said UNK also read UNK trump to sign order that will make getting h1b visa harder for UNK UNK s statement comes weeks after us president donald trump signed an executive order emphasising that the h UNK 1b should be used to bring on only very specialised workers in the us and not generic UNK and UNK UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the move is aimed at companies like infosys and tcs that often hire indian UNK and UNK in the us instead of hiring locals UNK who may demand higher wages for the similar job UNK many in the us government also believe that indian companies game the h UNK 1b visa system and get disproportionate share of these visas UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ nasscom UNK an _BEGIN_ tree trunks emit greenhouse gas instead of storing it UNK study _END_
_BEGIN_ washington UNK apr 3 UNK pti UNK tree trunks in UNK forests actually emit methane rather than storing it UNK say scientists who claim to have found a new UNK previously unaccounted source of this powerful greenhouse gas UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ researchers from university of delaware UNK ud UNK in the us found that UNK forest soils usually take up and store methane UNK but this effect can be UNK by methane emissions from tree trunks UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ they tested a cluster of trees UNK soil and coarse woody debris UNK cwd UNK UNK dead wood lying on the forest floor in various stages of UNK UNK to measure UNK of methane and carbon dioxide UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the team used a state UNK of UNK the UNK art greenhouse gas analyser based on laser UNK technology UNK called off UNK axis integrated cavity output UNK UNK UNK UNK UNK UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ they visited the site over the course of one growing season UNK april to december UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ researchers measured the carbon dioxide and methane UNK of the soil UNK tree trunks and cwd to determine whether those three components were sources or sinks of these greenhouse gases UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK we believe our work can help fill in some gaps in methane budgets and environmental processes in global ecosystem models UNK said rodrigo vargas assistant professor in ud UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK what we have found in this study is that some coarse woody debris act kind of like the soil and consume methane while other pieces of coarse woody debris emit small amounts of methane UNK which is also what we saw with living tree trunks UNK said daniel warner of ud UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the tree trunks constantly have low but UNK emissions of methane UNK said vargas UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK soils are providing an environmental service of UNK this potent greenhouse gas UNK but the trunks are releasing methane equivalent to 4 per cent of what could be captured by cwd and soils at the ecosystem scale UNK he said UNK _END_

_BEGIN_ new alzheimer UNK s test can predict when disease will appear _END_
_BEGIN_ scientists have developed a new genetic test for alzheimer UNK s risk that can be used to predict the age at which a person will develop the disease UNK a high score on the test UNK which is based on 31 genetic markers UNK can translate to being diagnosed many years earlier than those with a low UNK risk genetic profile UNK the study found UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ those ranked in the top 10 UNK in terms of risk were more than three times as likely to develop alzheimer UNK s during the course of the study UNK and did so more than a decade before those who ranked in the lowest 10 UNK rahul UNK UNK of the university of california UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ who led the international effort UNK said the test could be used to calculate any individual UNK s risk of developing alzheimer UNK s that year UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK that is UNK if you don UNK t already have dementia UNK what is your yearly risk for ad onset UNK based on your age and genetic information UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ he said UNK the so UNK called UNK hazard score test was developed using genetic data from more than 70 UNK 000 individuals UNK including patients with alzheimer UNK s disease and healthy elderly people UNK it is already known that genetics plays a powerful role in alzheimer UNK s UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ around a quarter of patients have a strong family history of the disease UNK and scientists have shown this is partly explained by a gene called apoe UNK which comes in three versions UNK and is known to have a powerful influence on the risk of getting the most common late UNK onset type of alzheimer UNK s UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ one version of apoe appears to reduce risk by up to 40 UNK while those with two copies UNK one from each parent UNK of the high UNK risk version can increase risk by 12 times UNK the latest study takes a new approach UNK showing that UNK aside from apoe UNK there are thousands of background genetic variations that each have a tiny influence on alzheimer UNK s risk UNK but whose cumulative influence is substantial UNK the researchers first identified nearly 2 UNK 000 single letter differences in the genetic code UNK known as UNK UNK and UNK after ranking them for influence UNK developed a test based on 31 of the markers UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the test was then used to accurately predict an individual UNK s risk of getting the disease in an independent patient cohort UNK in people with the high UNK risk version of apoe UNK those ranked in the top 10 UNK of risk on the new test got alzheimer UNK s at an average age of 84 years UNK compared with 95 years for those ranked in the lowest 10 UNK james UNK UNK head of research at alzheimer UNK s society UNK said UNK UNK preventing the development of dementia symptoms is the holy UNK of alzheimer UNK s research but to succeed we first need accurate methods to predict who is most likely to develop the condition UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this study UNK s approach was fairly successful at predicting the likelihood of someone developing dementia over the coming year UNK but needs to be tested further in mixed UNK non UNK us populations UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK added that UNK while the score could help to identify people for trials UNK it was too early to apply it as a genetic testing tool for use in the clinic UNK UNK sancho UNK head of research at alzheimer UNK s research uk UNK said that while genetic makeup can influence the chances of developing dementia UNK a healthy diet UNK regular physical activity and remaining mentally active can also drive down the risk UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK genetics is only part of the story and we know that lifestyle factors also influence our risk of developing alzheimer UNK s UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ she said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the best current evidence points to habits we can all adopt to help lower our risk and indicates that what UNK s good for your heart is also good for the brain UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the findings are published in the journal UNK medicine UNK _END_

the genome UNK the algorithm can figure out which set of genes gives the best predictions UNK even if they are not core clock genes UNK hughey said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in addition to predicting rhythms produced by the circadian clock differ widely between individuals at any given time of day and they are often disrupted by modern environments UNK for example due to shift work or reduced exposure to sunlight UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ circadian dysfunction is linked to conditions such as cancer UNK UNK disorder and obesity UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ knowledge of an individuals circadian rhythms could spend less time listening to the patients or their caregivers UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the concept of shared decision making is almost absent UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the average conversation between a doctor and a _BEGIN_ london UNK apr 24 UNK pti UNK oxford university students who avoid making eye contact with their peers could be guilty of racism UNK according to the prestigious UNK latest guidance UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the universitys equality and diversity unit has advised undergraduate students that UNK not speaking directly to people UNK could be deemed a UNK racial micro UNK aggression UNK which can lead to UNK mental ill UNK health UNK the telegraph reported UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ issued at the start of the trinity term UNK the third term at the university UNK the newsletter claims that asking someone where they are UNK originally UNK from implies they are a foreigner UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ it also claims that UNK jokes drawing attention to UNK differences UNK and UNK not speaking directly to people UNK are potential forms of UNK everyday racism UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the universitys equality and diversity unit explains in the newsletter that UNK some people who do these things may be entirely well UNK meaning UNK and would be mortified to realise that they had caused offence UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK but this is of little consequence if a possible effect of their words or actions is to suggest to people that they may fulfil a negative stereotype UNK or do not belong UNK it states UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ however UNK some critics slammed the newsletter UNK saying it would make the students over sensitive UNK about how they interact with one another UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK essentially people are being accused of a thought crime UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ they are being accused of thinking incorrect thoughts based on an assumption of where they may or may not be looking UNK she said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ williams UNK who is author of academic freedom in an age of conformity UNK said that oxford universitys guidance was UNK UNK the mark UNK by telling students UNK how they should feel and think UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ tom UNK UNK co UNK coordinator of the free speech university ranking project that _BEGIN_ govt plans to change security marks of banknotes in 3 UNK 4 yrs _END_
_BEGIN_ to check counterfeiting UNK the government plans to change security features of higher denomination banknotes of rs 2 UNK 000 and rs 500 every 3 UNK 4 years in accordance with global standards UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the move comes in the wake of recovery of a large amount of fake indian currency notes in last four months after demonetisation UNK the issue was discussed UNK at a high UNK level meeting on thursday attended by senior officials of the ministries of finance and home UNK including union home secretary rajiv mehrishi UNK advocating the move UNK home ministry officials said most of the developed countries change security features of their currency notes every 3 UNK 4 years and therefore UNK it is absolutely necessary for india to follow this policy UNK decision long UNK change in design of indian currency notes of higher denominations was long due UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ till its demonetisation UNK there had been no major change in the rs 1 UNK 000 note since its introduction in 2000 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ changes in the old rs 500 note UNK which was launched in 1987 UNK were carried out more than a decade ago UNK the newly introduced notes had no additional security features and were similar to those in the old rs 1 UNK 000 and rs 500 notes UNK officials said UNK 11 of 17 security features UNK close look by the investigators on some of the recently seized fake notes found that at least 11 of the 17 security features in the new rs 2 UNK 000 notes had been replicated UNK these included the transparent area UNK watermark UNK ashoka pillar emblem UNK the letters rs 2000 on the left UNK the guarantee clause with the reserve bank of india governors signature and the denomination number in UNK on the front UNK officials said UNK besides UNK the motif of UNK UNK the swachh bharat logo and the year of printing had been copied on the reverse side UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ although the print and paper quality of the seized UNK was poor UNK they resembled genuine notes UNK the officials said the change of security features of currency notes in every 3 UNK 4 years will lead to curbing of counterfeiting to a great extent UNK those who were arrested recently along with fake notes with face value of rs 2 UNK 000 have told investigators that the notes were printed in pakistan with the help of the inter services intelligence UNK isi UNK and had been smuggled into the country through bangladesh UNK the officials claimed UNK a study conducted by the indian statistical institute UNK kolkata UNK in 2016 pegged the value of fake indian _BEGIN_ switzerland warns it can suspend black money info exchange _END_
_BEGIN_ as india and other countries await an automatic exchange of information from next year about suspected black money hoarders in swiss banks UNK switzerland has said it can suspend such sharing of details at any time if confidentiality is not maintained UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ as part of an international commitment to fight the black money menace UNK switzerland has effected the automatic exchange of information standard since january 1 UNK 2017 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the sharing of details under this framework will begin from next year with the first batch of countries UNK including india UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK domestic financial institutions are collecting this data for the first time this year UNK and the swiss tax authorities will exchange it with their counterparts in partner states in 2018 UNK said the state secretariat for international financial matters UNK sif UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the swiss agency is mandated to defend the interests of switzerland on international financial and tax matters and participates in international negotiations UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ it said in its latest quarterly newsletter that necessary steps will be in place to ensure the exchanged data do not fall into the wrong hands or get misused UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK switzerland is prepared in principle to introduce the automatic exchange of information with all states and territories which meet the relevant requirements UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in this sense UNK the confidentiality and security of the data are important elements of this international standard UNK it said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK switzerland implements the automatic reciprocal exchange of information only with countries which can guarantee confidentiality and data protection UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ before any exchanges occur UNK the global forum on transparency and exchange of information for tax purposes carries out a thorough examination as to whether or not the partner states which have undertaken to introduce the automatic exchange of information comply with the requirements UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK in some important cases UNK switzerland additionally gets an on UNK the UNK spot impression of the situation in the partner states UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ given that switzerland does not belong to the group of countries which implemented the standard early on UNK so UNK called early UNK UNK it is also benefiting from the experience of other countries UNK the sif said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK before the first exchange occurs UNK it will be able to examine if all significant elements of the standard have been met UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ should it subsequently UNK that a country has not fulfilled its obligations UNK switzerland can at any time suspend the automatic exchange of information with the country concerned UNK it added UNK system in place UNK relatively simple UNK the swiss agency further said the system in place so far has been UNK relatively simple UNK wherein whenever a foreign tax authority was interested in obtaining information located in switzerland UNK it had to make a request for administrative assistance UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK however UNK the rapid international developments in recent years have provided switzerland with two new forms of exchange of information in the area of taxes UNK spontaneous and automatic exchange of information UNK aeoi UNK it added UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in the case of the aeoi UNK countries mutually exchange information automatically on financial accounts and the details in this case are determined as the standards drawn up by the oecd UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the information in spontaneous exchange needs to be exchanged if the UNK country suspects that the information available might be of interest to another country UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ while spontaneous exchange has nothing to do with voluntary in this context UNK it only means that no preliminary request has been submitted UNK this framework was being handled very differently from country to country up to now UNK the sif said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK within the scope of the oecd and g20 project to combat base erosion and profit shifting UNK beps UNK the spontaneous exchange of information was specified for the first time in the area of advance tax rulings UNK where there is a risk of base erosion or profit shifting UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the federal council adopted the current international standard in this area in the context of a revision of the tax administrative assistance ordinance UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ switzerland will UNK exchange information on advance tax rulings for the first time next year UNK it added UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK number of domestic swiss bank branches has halved UNK the agency further said that over the past 30 years UNK the number of domestic bank branches in switzerland has almost halved UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK a reduction in the number of banking institutions and their branches can be the result of mergers UNK acquisitions and bankruptcies UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ a number of policy measures have been put in place by swiss authorities in recent years to address concerns of its banks providing high secrecy walls around their global clients UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ new rules make it much easier for several foreign jurisdictions UNK including india UNK to get details from switzerland about people suspected to be involved in tax evasion and other financial crimes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ switzerland has also been issuing notices to several resident indians and even indians settled abroad after the receipt of request from india for UNK administrative assistance UNK including information about their swiss bank account details UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ as per the local law UNK switzerland gives an opportunity to the entity concerned to challenge the sharing of information UNK before providing the assistance to the requesting nation UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ while india and switzerland late last year signed a new pact for automatic exchange of information about account details 2018 onwards UNK the pending requests have been made under their existing bilateral tax treaty UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the pace of seeking such details seems to have UNK in recent months UNK going by the sudden spurt in the number of indian names figuring in such notifications UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ also read UNK switzerland to share info on indians holding swiss bank accounts _END_

_BEGIN_ employers can ban staff from wearing headscarves UNK eu court _END_
_BEGIN_ politicians on the right have welcomed a ruling by the eu UNK s highest court that allows companies to ban staff from wearing visible religious symbols UNK as a long UNK awaited legal judgment UNK into the french and dutch election campaigns UNK in its first decision on the issue of women wearing islamic headscarves at work UNK the european court of justice in luxembourg ruled the garments could be banned UNK but only as part of a general policy barring all religious and political symbols UNK nor can customers simply demand workers remove headscarves if the company has no policy barring religious symbols UNK the court ruled on tuesday UNK the long UNK awaited ruling came on the eve of dutch elections UNK where muslim immigration has been a contentious issue UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in _END_ _BEGIN_ said the afd UNK s berlin leader UNK UNK UNK UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK of course companies have to be allowed to ban the wearing of headscarves UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the ecj issued a joint judgment in the cases of two women UNK from france and belgium UNK who were dismissed for refusing to remove headscarves UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK an internal rule of an undertaking which prohibits the visible wearing of any political UNK philosophical or religious sign does not constitute direct discrimination UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the court said UNK it ruled that a company UNK s wish to project a neutral image was legitimate and allowed internal rules banning political UNK philosophical or religious symbols UNK the first case was referred to the ecj by the belgian courts UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK a headscarf at work for religious reasons UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ achbita was fired in june 2006 for refusing to take off her scarf UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the company said she had broken unwritten rules prohibiting religious symbols UNK in the second case UNK asma bougnaoui UNK a design engineer UNK was fired from an it consultancy firm UNK UNK UNK after a customer complained that his staff had been UNK embarrassed UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ by her headscarf while she was on their premises to give advice UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ she had been told before taking the job that wearing a headscarf might pose problems for the company UNK s customers UNK in achbita UNK s case the ecj followed the advice of a senior legal adviser to the court UNK who argued that companies should be allowed to have policies banning the wearing of religious and political symbols UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the court of justice finds that UNK UNK s internal rule refers to the wearing of visible signs of political UNK philosophical or religious beliefs and therefore covers any manifestation of such beliefs without distinction UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the rule thus treats all employees to the undertaking in the same way UNK notably by requiring them UNK generally and without any UNK UNK to dress UNK UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK in bougnaoui UNK s case the court UNK s adviser had ruled that she had suffered discrimination UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ she had been UNK professionally competent UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ and sacked only because she had refused to remove her headscarf UNK the advocate general advised UNK the court upheld this view with a less ringing endorsement UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ it said customers UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ wishes not to be served by a worker wearing a headscarf did not give companies a get UNK out clause from eu anti UNK discrimination law UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK however UNK in the absence of such a rule UNK the willingness of an employer to take account of the wishes of a customer no longer to have the employer UNK s services provided by a worker wearing an islamic headscarf cannot be considered an occupational requirement that could rule out discrimination UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the ecj did not rule on whether bougnaoui UNK s dismissal was based on her failure to observe company policies UNK saying this was a matter for the french court to determine UNK the german broadsheet UNK UNK predicted that the ruling would fundamentally change how german courts assess similar cases UNK because the assumption since 2002 had been that religious symbols could not be banned from the workplace on anything other than safety grounds UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the ruling UNK which is more nuanced than a straightforward ban UNK could sow confusion about which religious symbols can be worn at work UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ some legal experts said it seemed to cut against a ruling from the european court of human rights UNK echr UNK that allowed crosses to be worn UNK steve peers UNK a professor of eu law at essex university UNK said the latest ecj ruling looked awkward when set against the echr judgment that wearing religious symbols is UNK sometimes an employee UNK s right to manifest freedom of religion UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ he said the ecj had not referred to this case law or attempted to deal with the distinction between freedom of religion and non UNK discrimination UNK the echr is the high court of the 47 UNK member council of europe and not part of the eu UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ traditionally UNK the eu court in luxembourg confined itself to evening out distortions in europe UNK s single market UNK but its remit has grown as eu law has expanded UNK the ruling prompted dismay from some religious groups UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the conference of european UNK UNK which comprises 700 jewish leaders across europe jewish men who wear UNK UNK sikh men who wear turbans UNK people who wear crosses UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ it affects all of them UNK but disproportionately muslim women UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ she said UNK of religious and political neutrality UNK and where that rule is applied equally to all UNK it can UNK t be realistically argued that that this constitutes UNK less favourable treatment UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ stamping of hand baggage to end at 7 airports from april 1 _END_
_BEGIN_ domestic air travellers at delhi and six other airports will not have to get hand baggage tag stamped anymore UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the central industrial security force UNK cisf UNK has decided to do away with the procedure to speed up the check in process from april 1 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ besides delhi UNK the rule will be implemented in mumbai UNK kolkata UNK bengaluru UNK hyderabad UNK ahmedabad and cochin UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in december UNK cisf had started trial runs for this but stamping was resumed after a week due to security concerns UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the bcas had in february issued an order announcing that the procedure was to be done away with but the cisf had at that time object to immediate implementation of the plan UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ following this UNK a joint meeting was held to iron out issues UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK appropriate measures have been taken UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the cycle of security check will speed up and our staff will get more time to check suspicious baggage UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ cisf dg op singh said UNK recently UNK cisf had conducted trial runs in two phases at 12 airports and concluded that stamping of baggage tags could be dispensed with after certain modifications of security architecture in security hold areas of the airports and installation of high definition cctv cameras UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ these modifications were required to make sure that passengers could not access bags containing restricted items which are segregated by cisf personnel for checking UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK high definition cctv cameras focussed on the baggage screening system were required so that cisf personnel who cleared a bag could be easily identified to fix accountability UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ a cisf official said UNK cisf had collected the feed back during the one UNK week trial run UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK in bengaluru UNK 89 UNK of the passengers appreciated the move UNK while 11 UNK said that stamp on tag brings a sense of security UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in delhi UNK over 2 UNK 400 flights were covered and in some cases UNK during random check at boarding gates UNK few suspicious items were caught UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ we were required to fill the gap before reintroducing it UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the official added UNK during the trial run from december 15 UNK 22 UNK security check areas were monitored through cctv cameras to ensure no passenger skips the mandatory check UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ cisf staff at the boarding gates have been asked not to check for baggage tag UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the decision was taken after the d UNK g met representatives of all the airlines last week UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK as per the feedback UNK stamping causes inconvenience to passengers UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ many a times UNK a passenger is turned away from the boarding gate if the tag gets misplaced UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ he further said UNK often if a traveller is asked to open a bag after it goes through a scan UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ others in the queue have to wait till their tags can be stamped UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK now UNK if one passenger is stopped UNK others in the queue can move on to the boarding gate after security check UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this will benefit the passengers and at no point UNK security will be compromised UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ he said UNK _END_

a person to sit as a judge ad UNK hoc for the purpose of the case UNK the court also recalled that its lack of jurisdiction does not relieve states of their obligation to settle their disputes by peaceful means UNK the choice of those means UNK rests with the parties under article 33 of the un charter UNK it said UNK adding UNK they are nonetheless under an obligation to seek such a settlement obligations which they have undertaken UNK india UNK s external affairs ministry while hailing the verdict especially welcomed the court UNK s positive observations on the principles UNK in the simla _BEGIN_ how has sc dealt with issue of personal laws in the past UNK _END_
_BEGIN_ triple talaq case UNK UNK from the petition filed by shayara bano in a case of divorce from her husband UNK is not the first matter relating to personal laws before the supreme court UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the apex court has dealt with several such cases before but surprisingly it has not given a consistent interpretation of the laws and provisions of constitution UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the conflict arises when personal laws are perceived to be in violation of the fundamental rights UNK article 13 of the constitution states that any law UNK which goes against the provisions of fundamental rights UNK shall be void to the extent of contravention UNK supreme court UNK s stand on personal UNK laws in india are UNK and UNK UNK existing in custom and practice UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ over the years UNK the supreme court has taken differing views on the question of precedence of personal laws over the fundamental rights UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in krishna singh vs mathura ahir case of 1980 UNK UNK UNK case of 1994 and ahmedabad women action group case of 1997 UNK the supreme court held that personal laws could not be challenged for being in contravention of the provisions of fundamental rights enshrined in the constitution UNK many believe that this interpretation of the supreme court has been based on a ruling of the bombay high court in UNK UNK UNK case of 1951 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in this case UNK the bombay high court has UNK that personal laws are not UNK laws UNK under article 13 of the constitution UNK but UNK a three UNK judge supreme court bench in UNK case of 1996 held that personal laws are void to the extent that they are in violation of the fundamental rights UNK all these aspects and arguments are likely to be placed and UNK the supreme court during the seven UNK day hearing of the triple talaq matter this summer UNK some recent cases of personal laws UNK shah bano UNK most famous case relating to personal laws was that of shah bano UNK who had fought long drawn legal battle seeking maintenance from her ex UNK husband UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in 1985 UNK the supreme court had directed shah bano UNK s husband to pay her alimony according to the laws applicable to other indians UNK the supreme court had rejected the argument of shah bano UNK s ex UNK husband that since she was paid during the period of UNK UNK the waiting period after divorce and also the amount of UNK UNK she was not entitled to any further maintenance under the muslim personal law UNK mary roy casethe very next year UNK the supreme court decided another case relating to christian personal law in the 1986 UNK case of mary roy UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the supreme court ruled that syrian christian women were entitled to equal share in their father UNK s property UNK before the supreme court order UNK the of 1925 for the same UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ as per the travancore and cochin acts UNK women received only a quarter of their male siblings or rs 5 UNK 000 whichever was less UNK UNK latifi UNK latifi was the lawyer of shah bano UNK who has won a maintenance case against her ex UNK husband in the supreme court UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ but UNK the apex court verdict was not received well by the conservative segment of muslim society UNK in order to pacify the swelling sentiment of the community UNK the then rajiv gandhi government enacted the muslim women UNK protection on divorce act UNK 1986 UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the new act overturned the judgment of the supreme court providing that a man was required to pay maintenance to his divorced wife only during the period of UNK UNK UNK latifi challenged the constitutional validity of the personal law UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the supreme court UNK in 2001 during the atal bihari vajpayee government UNK held that the muslim women UNK protection on divorce act UNK 1986 did not violate the constitution or the fundamental rights UNK the supreme court maintained that the personal laws need not be tested on the UNK of the provisions of the fundamental rights UNK triple talaq case in bombay high UNK another case of triple talaq UNK the bombay high court held in 2002 that if wife contests this practice of divorce UNK it needed to be proved in a court of law UNK that a muslim man did not have a unilateral right to divorce his wife by triple talaq UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the man is bound to provide good reasons for a divorce UNK adoption by muslim UNK supreme court again delivered a landmark judgment in 2014 on the question of adoption of child by a muslim woman UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the muslim personal law does not give women of the community the right to adopt
